headline: These 3 Stocks Just Graduated to the MSCI World Index
summary: The MSCI World Index's February review adds three new companies to the global benchmark as capital flows into space, AI, and aerospace sectors.

raw.headline: These 3 Stocks Just Graduated to the MSCI World Index
raw.summary: The MSCI World Index's February review adds three new companies to the global benchmark as capital flows into space, AI, and aerospace sectors.

headline: Verizon Frontier Deal Reshapes Fiber Reach Valuation Gap And Turnaround Story
summary: Verizon Communications (NYSE:VZ) has closed its acquisition of Frontier Communications, expanding its fiber footprint and integrated connectivity offerings. The company is reshaping its leadership, with the consumer division chief exiting and interim management taking over that unit. Verizon is also cutting thousands of jobs and moving a large portion of its retail footprint to a franchise model as part of a broader turnaround plan. For investors watching NYSE:VZ, these moves come as the...
